TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowQueue extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

span.span: Represents a workflow queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流程佇列是用來在工作流程的主機或主機服務與活動之間傳遞訊息。Workflow queues are used to pass messages between a host or host services and activities in a workflow. 任何活動可以呼叫 來建立 ，而主機、服務或其他活動可以呼叫 以加入項目至該 。Any activity can create a by calling , and a host, a service, or another activity can call to add an item to that . 您可以訂閱項目到達 時要通知的 事件。You can subscribe to the event to be notified when an item arrives on the . 您可以使用 檢查在 開頭的項目，以及使用 從 中移除項目。You can use to examine an item at the beginning of the and to remove an item from the . 每個 都與您可以用來在 上執行其他管理操作的 有關聯，例如刪除佇列。Each is associated with a that you can use to perform other management operations on the , such as deleting the queue. 會公開與此 關聯的 。 exposes the associated with this . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何呼叫 方法來建立 。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a by calling the method. 它也會使用 屬性來判斷目前的佇列中是否有任何訊息。It also uses the property to determine whether any messages exist in the current queue. 最後，此程式碼會使用 方法來移除並傳回佇列中的第一個物件。Finally, the code uses the method to remove and return the first object in the queue. 這個程式碼範例是 FileSystemEvent.cs 檔案中＜檔案監看員活動 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 檔案系統監看員活動](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99)。For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#227](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#227)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#227](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#227)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueueItemArrived As EventHandler(Of QueueEventArgs)

summary.span: 在此 上傳遞項目時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an item is delivered on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件僅用於必須與傳遞至工作流程執行個體的事件同步發生的處理。This event is only used for processing that must occur synchronously with event delivery to the workflow instance. 事件處理常式可在非工作流程執行緒上執行，因此必須保護任何共用工作流程物件的存取 (例如，)。The event handler may execute on a non-workflow thread so access to any shared workflow object, for example, any , must be protected.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueueItemAvailable As EventHandler(Of QueueEventArgs)

summary.span: 在此 上提供項目時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an item is available on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件是以非同步方式引發。The event is raised in an asynchronous manner. 事件的寄件者將是訂閱 的 。The sender for the event will be the of the subscribing .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用多載的 方法來註冊 事件的訂閱者。You can use the overloaded methods to register a subscriber for the event. 事件是用來通知訂閱者已有項目傳遞 (以非同步方式) 到此 。The event is used to notify subscribers that an item has been delivered (in an asynchronous manner) to this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果訂閱活動的限定名稱 (Qualified Name) 是由 `subscriberQualifiedName` 提供，則呼叫 時，便會在與此佇列關聯之 的 中傳回該限定名稱。If the qualified name of the subscribing activity is supplied by `subscriberQualifiedName`, it is returned in of associated with this queue when is called.
